name: launchmat
title: Launchmat
description: A powerful Launchpad replacement for macOS with custom organization and Liquid Glass design
author: your_github_username

commands.name: index
commands.title: Launchmat
commands.description: Launch and organize your applications with custom folders

commands.name: quick-add
commands.title: Quick Add to Folder
commands.description: Quickly add applications to custom folders

scripts.setup-dev: echo 'Setting up Launchmat development environment...' && npm run lint
scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
